## About

BTC Predictor is an open-source autonomous BTC/USD perpetual futures trading system
that combines Claude Sonnet (Anthropic LLM) with XGBoost (~86% accuracy) in a
dual-gate prediction architecture. Every prediction is committed to the Polygon PoS
blockchain as an immutable audit trail.

## Stack

- AI Engine: Claude Sonnet (Anthropic) + XGBoost dual-gate prediction
- Backend: Python Flask + Gunicorn on Railway
- Database: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Exchange: Kraken Futures (PF_XBTUSD)
- Blockchain: Polygon PoS — BTCBotAudit.sol (0xe4661F7dB62644951Eb1F9Fd23DB90e647833a55)
- Orchestration: n8n Cloud (9 workflows)
- Dashboard: Vanilla JS + Chart.js

## Key Features

- Dual-gate LLM + XGBoost prediction (both must agree before placing an order)
- On-chain audit trail: every prediction hashed to Polygon PoS at placement, resolved on close
- Walk-forward backtesting across 6 strategies (A → F)
- Pyramiding: adds to winning positions at higher confidence
- Dead hours filter: automatically suppresses trading during low-win-rate UTC hours
- Macro calendar guard: ForexFactory high-impact USD events ±2h window
- Telegram commander: /status /balance /position /bets /close /pause /resume + Claude chat

## Data Sources

- Binance Futures: OHLCV klines (5m/15m/4h), L/S ratio, funding rate, taker ratio
- CoinGecko: BTC market data
- Alternative.me: Fear & Greed Index
- ForexFactory: Macro calendar
- CoinDesk, CryptoCompare, CNBC, Sole24Ore: News sentiment
